name: To the moon (itch) (bananaback)
description:
A game joining Game Off 2020.
The story is about a dream cow who dreams of coming to the moon.

Wisely destroy everything that stands in your way, reach the top to find the secret.
HOW TO PLAY: 
- W, A, S, D to move.

- Left click to shoot.

- When losing the game, press ENTER to start over.
- Press any key to read the story.
Hope you enjoy it! :)

You will feel the joy when you climb to the top. I bet :))

Please leave me a vote and a comment. Love you guys <3

I have used assets of Sparklin Labs, Pixel Frog and RottingPixels
https://github.com/sparklinlabs/superpowers-asset-packs
https://itch.io/profile/pixelfrog-store

https://opengameart.org/content/2d-four-seasons-platformer-tileset-16x16
